subject: VAM System and Box
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

ich have a few questions to buy right.

Could you explain to me the difference between the Pro x/Plus X Box and 
which one I need now? Is it possible that it's not working? I've had the 
pedals for a while now, connected to Simsonn config V4, and the manual 
says Sim Racing Pro Pedal. Now I've installed the new version (Manager 
2.1.0), and after the update, it works perfectly. It now says Simsonn 
Plus. It's all confusing. I actually want the VAM system, but I don't 
know which one to use. Greeting Oliver Jakobi

conversations.body_text: Hi Oliver Jakobi,  If your pedal is a SIMSONN Pro Plus, you need to purchase the PlusX control box for compatibility. The ProX control box will not work with your pedal. You only need to purchase VAM Pro + 24V DC power supply + PlusX control box.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
I understand, the pedals are an older system. It's a Simson Pro. That means VAM Pro+PlusX Box + 24V DC, which has a proper plug for Germany.

Hi Oliver Jakobi,  Yes, for orders within the EU (excluding the UK), we will send a European standard plug by default. You may also add a note specifying the plug type you require when placing your order.
